Articles.Content: SO I launch get up and start to move my craft into orbit. about half way when I disengage my side rockets my orbital line goes away. even if I have a maneuver set it, they still go away. can someone please tell me why this is? Thank you!
Fairings getting stuck in your rocket will cause this; If you aren't deploying the fairing when you're dropping the rockets, then it's something else.
